lines.text: Something tells me this grey hare is in the middle again.
Of course, if you really want to make something good, nothing beats a good old Louisiana Back-bay Bayou Bunny Bordelaise, a la Antoine.
A la Antoine? ZE Antoine of New Orleans?
I don't mean Antoine of Flatbush.
And now, for Antoine's recipe. First, immerse the rabbit thoroughly in wine.
Already I am ze - Hiccup! - pickled.
Now just an odie calone minute Doc!
